Package the_game.Deprecated_classes

Class Action

java.lang.Object
the_game.Deprecated_classes.Action
public class Action extends Object
Deprecated.
Replaced by package action
A class which regroup all the possible actions in the game. Includes actions outside and during a fight.
Author:
Camille Girodengo

    • isInStringArray

      public static boolean isInStringArray(String[] arrayStr, String strToFind)
      Deprecated.
      Finds if a String equals another String in array of String
      Parameters:
      arrayStr - the String array in which a String must be found
      strToFind - the String to find in an array
      Returns:
      true if the String is in the array

    • findIndexEntity

      public static int findIndexEntity(Entity[] entities, String nameEntityToFind)
      Deprecated.

      Finds the index of the searched entity based on its name.
      Considers that each entity's name is unique (no entity have the same name)

      Parameters:
      entities - the array of Entity to search in
      nameEntityToFind - the entity name to find
      Returns:
      the index of the first entity whose name is the String in the parameters

    • passiveActions

      public static String[] passiveActions(String[] variablePActions)
      Deprecated.
      Create the String array containing all possible actions available when not in a fight.
      Parameters:
      variablePActions - a String array that contains all actions that are not final (like move actions and chest opening actions)
      Returns:
      a String array containing all the available actions outside a fight
      See Also:
      • for changing passive actions

    • notFinalPassiveActions

      public static String[] notFinalPassiveActions()
      Deprecated.
      Create a String array that contains all the actions that might not be available to the player depending on their surroundings
      Returns:
      a String array, the content never changes

    • evaluateAvailablePassiveActions

      public static String[] evaluateAvailablePassiveActions(Hero hero, int[][] walls, Chest[] chests, String[] passiveActions)
      Deprecated.
      Evaluate which passive actions are available depending on the hero's immediate surroundings
      Parameters:
      hero - the hero whose surroundings are checked
      walls - an array of int arrays which contains the location of all walls of the map except the borders.
      chests - a Chest array, mostly used to know where all the chests are in this case
      passiveActions - a String array which contains all possibly changing passive actions
      Returns:
      a String array which contains all available changing passive actions

    • executePassiveCommand

      public static void executePassiveCommand(String[] command, Hero hero, int[][] walls, Chest[] chests, Enemy[] enemies, Boss[] bosses) throws InterruptedException
      Deprecated.
      Determines which action to execute outside of a fight depending on the command input
      Parameters:
      command - the String array which contains the command entered by the player
      hero - the character controlled by the player
      walls - an array of int arrays which contains the location of all walls of the map except the borders.
      chests - a Chest array containing the informations on all the chest on the map
      enemies - a Enemy array containing all hostile living entities that can be attacked by the hero outside of bosses. Used here for the "Show Map" action only.
      bosses - a Boss array containing all hostile bosses entities that can be attacked by the hero. Include known and hidden bosses. Used here for the "Show Map" action only.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • checkHeroLocation

      public static void checkHeroLocation(Hero hero, Boss[] bosses)
      Deprecated.
      Check if the hero is at a special location and modify bosses information depending on this information. Can be altered to include an Enemy and Chest array in the parameters if needed.
      Parameters:
      hero - the character controlled by the player
      bosses - a Boss array containing all bosses entities and their informations including location, stats, name, title, etc... Include known and hidden bosses.

    • fightActions

      public static String[] fightActions(String[] enemiesNames)
      Deprecated.
      Create a String array containing all available fight actions including those that changes depending on the name of the enemy.
      Parameters:
      enemiesNames - the names of all the enemies right next to the hero
      Returns:
      a String array with all available fight actions

    • executeFightCommand

      public static boolean executeFightCommand(String[] command, Hero hero, int[][] walls, Chest[] chests, Enemy[] enemies, Boss[] bosses)
      Deprecated.
      Determines which action to execute during a fight depending on the command input
      Parameters:
      command - the String array which contains the command entered by the player
      hero - the character controlled by the player
      walls - an array of int arrays which contains the location of all walls of the map except the borders.
      chests - a Chest array containing the informations on all the chest on the map. Used here for the "Show Map" action only.
      enemies - a Enemy array containing all hostile living entities that can be attacked by the hero outside of bosses.
      bosses - a Boss array containing all hostile bosses entities that can be attacked by the hero. Include known and hidden bosses.
      Returns:
      Whether or not it still is the hero's turn or not

    • maxSpeedEnemies

      public static int maxSpeedEnemies(String[] enemiesNames, Enemy[] enemies, Boss[] bosses)
      Deprecated.
      Determines the maximum speed of the enemies around the hero
      Parameters:
      enemiesNames - the names of the enemies or bosses around the hero
      enemies - an Enemy array of all the hostile entities of the map outside of bosses
      bosses - a Boss array of all the bosses of the map
      Returns:
      the maximum speed of the enemies around the hero

    • enemiesAttack

      public static void enemiesAttack(Hero hero, Enemy[] enemies, Boss[] bosses, int minSpeed, int maxSpeed)
      Deprecated.
      A void to make all enemies in the hero's surrounding whose speed is in the interval [minSpeed, maxSpeed] attack.
      Parameters:
      hero - the character controlled by the player. Is the target of all attacks.
      enemies - a Enemy array of all hostile entities outside of bosses that can attack the hero.
      bosses - a Boss array of all hostile bosses that can attack the hero.
      minSpeed - the minimum speed for an hostile entity to have to attack
      maxSpeed - the maximum speed for an hostile entity to have to attack

    • isBossDown

      public static boolean isBossDown(Boss boss)
      Deprecated.
      Verify if a known boss has been defeated or not
      Parameters:
      boss - the boss whose defeat must be confirmed
      Returns:
      a boolean. Returns true if the boss is down, false if the boss is still alive.

    • specialBossFight

      public static void specialBossFight(Hero hero, Boss boss) throws InterruptedException
      Deprecated.
      The complete fight void of the fight between the hero and a special boss (Here the VOID boss fight). The name of the void can be changed if another special boss fight is made for a new boss.
      Parameters:
      hero - the character controlled by the player
      boss - the special boss the hero is currently facing
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • initializePhase2

      public static void initializePhase2(Boss boss) throws InterruptedException
      Deprecated.
      Changes the stats of the special boss after the initialization of the second phase of the boss fight and call the Message void associated to it.
      Parameters:
      boss - the special boss whose stats are to change
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • specialFightActions

      public static String[] specialFightActions(Boss boss, int phase)
      Deprecated.
      Create a String array containing all available fight actions during the special boss fight depending on the boss type and the phase
      Parameters:
      boss - the special boss the hero is facing
      phase - the current phase of the boss fight
      Returns:
      a String array containing all available special boss fight actions

    • executeSpecialFightCommand

      public static boolean executeSpecialFightCommand(String[] command, Hero hero, Boss boss, int phase) throws InterruptedException
      Deprecated.
      /** Determines which action to execute during a special boss fight depending on the command input
      Parameters:
      command - the String array which contains the command entered by the player
      hero - the character controlled by the player
      boss - the special Boss to fight
      phase - the current phase of the special boss fight
      Returns:
      Whether or not it still is the hero's turn or not
      Throws:
      InterruptedException
